segments.text: I see the woman focused on drying a plate, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, cascading onto the floor, but she seems undisturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of worry for her; she could slip at any moment in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks determined, stretching his body toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how the woman hasn’t noticed that he’s risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands beside him, her arm reaching up with hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of mundane and chaotic, as if the kitchen has a life of its own.
segments.speaker: PAR
